LinkedIn Profile : I enjoy creating videos in my free time and am interested in the health care field. I have helped take care of my grandma in the last year. I also enjoy playing sports and being active. 

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:

I hope it will benefit my students that I serve by providing them with more educational opportunities around the community. I am just looking for something different and am open to anything!
